Desc.entry: Manages community centre activities including whist drive, karate, bingo and ballroom dancing. Holds fundraising events. Hall available for hire (see separate entry).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 2-4pm (whist, cards, bingo over 50's), 7-9pm (karate), Tues & Thurs 7-9.30pm (bingo), Wed 7.15-9.15pm & altermante Sat 2.30-5pm (whist drive), Thurs at 10am (ballroom dancing), Fri 7.30-9.30pm (sequence dance), Sat 10am-12noon (young people's dance)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 36
